author: timbeiko
content: Fun, somewhat expensive, project: call all of the new Dencun opcodes + precompiles on mainnet ðŸ˜„  Cheaper version: find the first occurence of other them by looking at traces ðŸ‘€

author: timbeiko
content: welp, Marius front ran everyone, sorry!

author: lightclient
content: you can run a query on dune against `ethereum.traces` to figure out first calls to precompiles, but figuring out first occurrences of op codes is harder as it doesn't look like they have that level of granularity

author: lightclient
content: someone decent at js could write a quick script to run in the geth attach console which checks the output of `debug.traceTransaction(..)` for first use of ops
